Title: The Battle of Algiers
Writer: Franco Solinas, Franco Solinas (story), Gillo Pontecorvo (story)
Actors: Brahim Hadjadj, Jean Martin, Yacef Saadi, Samia Kerbash
Plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 6 nominations.
